title: Payback
description: When Curt finds out his wife is cheating on him, he decides on getting a little revenge. He figures if she wants to be a slut, he'll give her what she desires.Liz expected a romantic evening with her husband. Little did she know, he knew of her infidelity. When he makes an ultimatum, she is willing to do anything he wants to save the marriage. She just didn't expect that included his two best friends.
author: E.M. Leya
